com.complexible.stardog.repair

Class RepairPlanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.complexible.stardog.repair.RepairPlanner

  • public class RepairPlanner
extends Object

    Computes multiple plans to resolve one or more inconsistencies. A repair plan is a minimal sequence of update operations that will resolve all the inconsistencies when executed. Minimality ensures that removing any operation from a plan will cause one of the inconsistencies to remain.

    Update operations may remove existing statements from the database or add new statements. Addition operations are typically parametrized and values should be provided before execution. Addition of new values might yield new inconsistencies, e.g. if the parameter value is not valid, in which case the planner can be rerun with new proofs.

    This class can also be used to undo arbitrary inferences if the proofs given as input to the planner explain an inference.

    Version:
    2.3
    Author:
    Evren Sirin, Hector Perez-Urbina

      • require

        public RepairPlanner require(Collection<com.complexible.stardog.api.update.UpdateOperation> theRequiredActions)
        Sets the required operations for the plans returned by this planner. Every plan computed by this planner will include all of these operations. The given operations should be implied by the specified proofs. For example, a remove operation can be required only if there is a proof node stating the corresponding set of statements are asserted. If this condition is not met, the planner will return empty plans.
        Returns:
        this planner

      • require

        public RepairPlanner require(com.complexible.stardog.api.update.UpdateOperation... theRequiredActions)
        Sets the required operations for the plans returned by this planner.
        Returns:
        this planner

      • getRequired

        public Set<com.complexible.stardog.api.update.UpdateOperation> getRequired()
        Returns the required operations for the plans returned by this planner.

      • prohibit

        public RepairPlanner prohibit(Collection<com.complexible.stardog.api.update.UpdateOperation> theProhibitedActions)
        Sets the prohibited operations for the plans returned by this planner. No plan computed by this planner may include any of these operations. If too many actions are prohibited, the planner might not be able to find ant plans.
        Returns:
        this planner

      • prohibit

        public RepairPlanner prohibit(com.complexible.stardog.api.update.UpdateOperation... theProhibitedActions)
        Sets the prohibited operations for the plans returned by this planner.

        Returns the prohibited operations for the plans returned by this planner.

      • metrics

        public RepairPlanner metrics(Iterable<RepairPlanMetric> theMetrics)
        Sets the metrics used by this planner to sort plans. The limit is applied on sorted plans so only the top K plans according to the given metrics will be returned. The order of the metrics is important as a lexicographic ordering is used.
        Returns:
        this planner
        See Also:
        RepairPlanMetrics.planComparator(List)

      • metrics

        public RepairPlanner metrics(RepairPlanMetric... theMetrics)

      • plans

        public List<RepairPlan> plans()
        Computes and returns a list of unique repair plans sorted by their ascending cost values.
